Docs.summary: A RemoteInput object specifies input to be collected from a user to be passed along with an intent inside a that is sent.

The intent to add remote input results to. The ClipData field of the intent will be modified to contain the results.

Docs.summary: Same as #addResultsToIntent but for setting data results.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void AddResultsToIntent (Android.App.RemoteInput[] remoteInputs, Android.Content.Intent intent, Android.OS.Bundle results);
.method public static hidebysig void AddResultsToIntent(class Android.App.RemoteInput[] remoteInputs, class Android.Content.Intent intent, class Android.OS.Bundle results) cil managed
static member AddResultsToIntent : Android.App.RemoteInput[] * Android.Content.Intent * Android.OS.Bundle -> unit

Docs.param: The remote inputs for which results are being provided
The intent to add remote inputs to. The ClipData field of the intent will be modified to contain the results.
A bundle holding the remote input results. This bundle should be populated with keys matching the result keys specified in remoteInputs with values being the CharSequence results per key.
Docs.summary: Populate an intent object with the text results gathered from remote input.

Docs.param: The intent object that fired in response to an action or content intent which also had one or more remote input requested.
Docs.summary: Get the source of the RemoteInput results.
Docs.returns: The source of the results. If no source was set, #SOURCE_FREE_FORM_INPUT will be returned.

Docs.summary: Returns true if the input only accepts data, meaning #getAllowFreeFormInput is false, #getChoices is null or empty, and #getAllowedDataTypes is non-null and not empty.
